column2: Target Hospitality Corp. engages in the provision of rental accommodations with premium catering and value-added hospitality services. The company is headquartered in The Woodlands, Texas. The firm operates through two business sectors, such as Target and Signor. The firm also own and operate the family residential center in the United States, serving asylum-seeking women and children. The company provides customized specialty rental accommodations, culinary services, and hospitality solutions, including site design, construction, operations, security, housekeeping, catering, concierge services, and health and recreation facilities.
